definition: (of a couple) to be sweet to each other/lovey-dovey/variant of 膩味|腻味[ni4 wei5]
greasy/soft/unctuous/intimate/tired of
to sprain (one's ankle) (Tw)

sentences.english: I'm sick of the whole shebang.
sentences.chinese: 我对整个这件事腻歪透了。

sentences.english: I'm rather bored with it but it's a nice little earner!
sentences.chinese: 我早就对它腻歪了，不过它是个很能赚钱的小玩意。
